018package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders;
019
020import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.DEFAULT;
021import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.FINAL;
022import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PRIVATE;
023import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
024import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.STATIC;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.MAINTAINED;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.SpecialPropertyType.CONFIG_PROPERTY_RESOURCEBUNDLE;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.CollectionKind.isList;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.CollectionKind.isMap;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.CollectionKind.isSet;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.EXEMPT_FROM_TOSTRING;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.GETTER_IS_DEFAULT;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_IS_SPECIAL;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.SYSTEM_PREFERENCE;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.SYSTEM_PROPERTY;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_ReadLock;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_WriteLock;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardMethod.STD_METHOD_AddListener;
040import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardMethod.STD_METHOD_GetRessourceBundle;
041import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardMethod.STD_METHOD_RemoveListener;
042import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardMethod.STD_METHOD_ToString;
043import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.Primitives.VOID;
044import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.INSTANCE_VARIABLE_OF_CONCRETE_CLASS;
045import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.THROW_CAUGHT_LOCALLY;
046import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.UNCHECKED;
047import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.createSuppressWarningsAnnotation;
048import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
049import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
050import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
051
052import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
053import java.io.IOException;
054import java.util.Properties;
055import java.util.StringJoiner;
056import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock;
057
058import org.apiguardian.api.API;
059import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
060import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigurationChangeListener;
061import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec;
062import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi.ConfigChangeListenerSupport;
063import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException;
064import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.MethodSpec;
065import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ParameterizedTypeName;
066import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
067import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.AutoLock;
068import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants;
069import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects;
070import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils;
071
072/**
073 *  The
074 *  {@linkplain org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder code builder implementation}
075 *  for the basic stuff, as defined in
076 *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigBeanSpec}.
077 *
078 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
079 *  @version $Id: ConfigBeanBuilder.java 942 2021-12-20 02:04:04Z tquadrat $
080 *  @UMLGraph.link
081 *  @since 0.1.0
082 */
083@SuppressWarnings( "OverlyCoupledClass" )
084@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ConfigBeanBuilder.java 942 2021-12-20 02:04:04Z tquadrat $" )
085@API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.1.0" )
086public final class ConfigBeanBuilder extends CodeBuilderBase
087{
088        /*--------------*\
089    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
090        \*--------------*/
091    /**
092     *  Creates a new instance of {@code ConfigBeanBuilder}.
093     *
094     *  @param  context The code generator context.
095     */
096    public ConfigBeanBuilder( final CodeGeneratorContext context )
097    {
098        super( context );
099    }   //  ConfigBeanBuilder()
100
101        /*---------*\
102    ====** Methods **==========================================================
103        \*---------*/
104    /**
105     *  Adds the listener support to the new class.
106     */
107    private final void addListenerSupport()
108    {
109        //---* Add the listener support *-------------------------------------
110        final var field = getComposer().fieldBuilder( ConfigChangeListenerSupport.class, STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport.toString() , PRIVATE, FINAL )
111            .addAnnotation( createSuppressWarningsAnnotation( getComposer(), INSTANCE_VARIABLE_OF_CONCRETE_CLASS ) )
112            .addJavadoc(
113                """
114                The support for the configuration change listener.
115                """ )
116            .build();
117        addField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport, field );
118
119        //---* Initialise the listener support *-------------------------------
120        var code = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
121            .add(
122                """
123                //---* Initialise the listener support *-------------------------------
124                """ )
125            .addStatement( "$N = new $T( this )", getField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport ), ConfigChangeListenerSupport.class )
126            .build();
127        addConstructorCode( code );
128
129        //---* Add the listener management methods *---------------------------
130        final var param1 = getComposer().parameterBuilder( ConfigurationChangeListener.class, "listener", FINAL )
131            .build();
132        code = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
133            .addStatement( "$N.addListener( $N )", getField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport ), param1 )
134            .build();
135        var method = getComposer().methodBuilder( STD_METHOD_AddListener.toString() )
136            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
137            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
138            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
139            .addParameter( param1 )
140            .returns( VOID )
141            .addCode( code )
142            .build();
143        addMethod( STD_METHOD_AddListener, method );
144
145        code = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
146            .addStatement( "$N.removeListener( $N )", getField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport ), param1 )
147            .build();
148        method = getComposer().methodBuilder( STD_METHOD_RemoveListener.toString() )
149            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
150            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
151            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
152            .addParameter( param1 )
153            .returns( VOID )
154            .addCode( code )
155            .build();
156        addMethod( STD_METHOD_RemoveListener, method );
157    }   //  addListenerSupport()
158
159    /**
160     *  Adds locking support to the new class.
161     */
162    private final void addLockSupport()
163    {
164        if( isSynchronized() )
165        {
166            //---* Add the locks *---------------------------------------------
167            var field = getComposer().fieldBuilder( AutoLock.class, STD_FIELD_ReadLock.toString(), PRIVATE, FINAL )
168                .addJavadoc(
169                    """
170                    The &quot;read&quot; lock.
171                    """ )
172                .build();
173            addField( STD_FIELD_ReadLock, field );
174
175            field = getComposer().fieldBuilder( AutoLock.class, STD_FIELD_WriteLock.toString(), PRIVATE, FINAL )
176                .addJavadoc(
177                    """
178                    The &quot;write&quot; lock.
179                    """ )
180                .build();
181            addField( STD_FIELD_WriteLock, field );
182
183            //---* Initialise the locks *--------------------------------------
184            final var code = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
185                .add(
186                    """
187                    
188                    //---* Create the locks and initialise them *--------------------------
189                    """ )
190                .addStatement( "final var lock = new $T()", ReentrantReadWriteLock.class )
191                .addStatement( "$N = $T.of( lock.readLock() )", getField( STD_FIELD_ReadLock ), AutoLock.class )
192                .addStatement( "$N = $T.of( lock.writeLock() )", getField( STD_FIELD_WriteLock ), AutoLock.class )
193                .build();
194            addConstructorCode( code );
195        }
196    }   //  addLockSupport()
197
198    /**
199     *  Adds &quot;unchecked&quot; to the
200     *  {@link SuppressWarnings}
201     *  annotation for the constructor if the given type is a
202     *  {@link java.util.List},
203     *  {@link java.util.Set},
204     *  {@link java.util.Map}
205     *  or an otherwise parameterised type.
206     *
207     *  @param  typeName    The type to check.
208     *
209     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.CollectionKind#isList(TypeName)
210     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.CollectionKind#isMap(TypeName)
211     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.CollectionKind#isSet(TypeName)
212     *  @see ParameterizedTypeName
213     */
214    @SuppressWarnings( "OverlyComplexBooleanExpression" )
215    private final void addUnchecked( final TypeName typeName )
216    {
217        if
218        (
219            isList( requireNonNullArgument( typeName, "typeName" ) )
220                || isMap( typeName )
221                || isSet( typeName )
222                || (typeName instanceof ParameterizedTypeName)
223        )
224        {
225            addConstructorSuppressedWarning( UNCHECKED );
226        }
227    }   //  addUnchecked()
228
229    /**
230     *  {@inheritDoc}
231     */
232    @Override
233    public final void build()
234    {
235        //---* Generate the default stuff *------------------------------------
236        addListenerSupport();
237        addLockSupport();
238
239        //---* Generate the properties *---------------------------------------
240        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
241        for( final var i = getProperties(); i.hasNext(); )
242        {
243            generateProperty( i.next() );
244        }
245
246        //---* Create the initialisation code in the constructor *-------------
247        getConfiguration().getInitDataMethod()
248            .ifPresent( this::composeInitializationCodeFromMethod );
249        getConfiguration().getInitDataResource()
250            .ifPresent( this::composeInitializationCodeFromResource );
251
252        //---* Create 'toString()' *-------------------------------------------
253        createToString();
254    }   //  build()
255
256    /**
257     *  Composes the constructor code that initialises the properties from the
258     *  result of a call to the {@code initData()} method.
259     *
260     *  @param  method  The {@code initData()} method.
261     */
262    private final void composeInitializationCodeFromMethod( final MethodSpec method )
263    {
264        final var builder = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
265            .add(
266                """
267                
268                /*
269                 * Initialise the properties from '$1N()'.
270                 */
271                """, method
272            )
273            .beginControlFlow(
274                """
275                try
276                """
277            );
278
279        if( method.hasModifier( DEFAULT ) )
280        {
281            builder.addStatement( "final var initData = initData()" );
282        }
283        else
284        {
285            assert method.hasModifier( STATIC ) : "initData() is neither DEFAULT nor STATIC";
286            builder.addStatement( "final var initData = $1T.initData()", getConfiguration().getSpecification() );
287        }
288
289        builder.beginControlFlow(
290            """
291            if( isNull( initData ) )
292            """ )
293            .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "isNull" )
294            .addStatement(
295                """
296                throw new $T( "initData() returns null" )""", ValidationException.class )
297            .endControlFlow();
298
299        PropertyLoop:
300        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
301        for( final var i = getProperties(); i.hasNext(); )
302        {
303            final var propertySpec = i.next().merge();
304            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( GETTER_IS_DEFAULT ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
305            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( PROPERTY_IS_SPECIAL )
306                && propertySpec.getSpecialPropertyType().filter( spt -> spt == CONFIG_PROPERTY_RESOURCEBUNDLE ).isEmpty() )
307            {
308                continue PropertyLoop;
309            }
310            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( SYSTEM_PROPERTY ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
311            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
312            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( SYSTEM_PREFERENCE ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
313
314            final var propertyType = propertySpec.getPropertyType();
315            final var field = propertySpec.getFieldName();
316            final var propertyName = propertySpec.getPropertyName();
317            addUnchecked( propertyType );
318
319            builder.beginControlFlow(
320                """
321                if( initData.containsKey( $1S ) )
322                """, propertyName )
323                .addStatement( "$1N = ($2T) initData.get( $3S )", field, propertyType.box(), propertyName )
324                .endControlFlow();
325        }   //  PropertyLoop:
326
327        builder.nextControlFlow(
328            """
329
330            catch( final $1T t )
331            """, Throwable.class )
332            .addStatement(
333                """
334                final var eiie = new $1T( "initData() failed" )""", ExceptionInInitializerError.class )
335            .addStatement( "eiie.addSuppressed( t )" )
336            .addStatement( "throw eiie" )
337            .endControlFlow();
338
339        //---* Add the code to the constructor *-------------------------------
340        addConstructorCode( builder.build() );
341    }   //  composeInitializationCodeFromMethod()
342
343    /**
344     *  Composes the constructor code that initialises the properties from the
345     *  provided resource.
346     *
347     *  @param  resourceName    The name of the resource.
348     */
349    private final void composeInitializationCodeFromResource( final String resourceName )
350    {
351        //---* The code that loads the properties from the resource *----------
352        final var builder = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
353            .add(
354                """
355
356                /*
357                 * Load initialisation data from resource "$1L".
358                 */
359                """, resourceName )
360            .beginControlFlow( EMPTY_STRING )
361            .addStatement( "final var resource = $1T.class.getResource( $2S )", getConfiguration().getSpecification(), resourceName )
362            .beginControlFlow(
363                """
364                if( isNull( resource ) )
365                """ )
366            .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "isNull" )
367            .addStatement(
368                """
369                final var fnfe = new $1T( "Resource '$2L'" )""", FileNotFoundException.class, resourceName )
370            .addStatement( """
371                final var eiie = new $1T( "Cannot find resource '$2L'" )""", ExceptionInInitializerError.class, resourceName )
372            .addStatement( "eiie.addSuppressed( fnfe )" )
373            .addStatement( "throw eiie" )
374            .endControlFlow()
375            .add( "\n" )
376            .addStatement( "final var initData = new $1T()", Properties.class )
377            .beginControlFlow(
378                """
379                try( final var inputStream = resource.openStream() )
380                """ )
381            .addStatement( "initData.load( inputStream )" )
382            .nextControlFlow(
383                """
384
385                catch( final $1T e )
386                """, IOException.class )
387            .addStatement(
388                """
389                final var eiie = new $1T( format( "Cannot load resource '%s'", resource.toExternalForm() ) )""", ExceptionInInitializerError.class )
390            .addStaticImport( StringUtils.class, "format" )
391            .addStatement( "eiie.addSuppressed( e )" )
392            .addStatement( "throw eiie" )
393            .endControlFlow()
394            .add(
395                """
396
397                /*
398                 * Initialise the properties.
399                 */
400                """ )
401            .addStatement( "$1T value", String.class );
402
403        PropertyLoop:
404        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
405        for( final var i = getProperties(); i.hasNext(); )
406        {
407            final var propertySpec = i.next().merge();
408            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( GETTER_IS_DEFAULT ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
409            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( PROPERTY_IS_SPECIAL ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
410            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( SYSTEM_PROPERTY ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
411            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
412            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( SYSTEM_PREFERENCE ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
413
414            /*
415             * Without a StringConverter we cannot initialise the property from
416             * the resource.
417             */
418            if( propertySpec.getStringConverterClass().isEmpty() ) continue PropertyLoop;
419            final var stringConverter = propertySpec.getStringConverterClass().get();
420
421            final var field = propertySpec.getFieldName();
422            final var propertyName = propertySpec.getPropertyName();
423
424            builder.add( "\n" )
425                .addStatement( "value = initData.getProperty( $1S )", propertyName )
426                .beginControlFlow(
427                    """
428                    if( nonNull( value ) )
429                    """ )
430                .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "nonNull" );
431
432            if( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverter ) )
433            {
434                builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = $1T.INSTANCE", stringConverter );
435            }
436            else
437            {
438                builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = new $1T()", stringConverter );
439            }
440
441            builder.addStatement( "$N = stringConverter.fromString( value )", field )
442                .endControlFlow();
443        }   //  PropertyLoop:
444        builder.endControlFlow();
445
446        addConstructorSuppressedWarning( THROW_CAUGHT_LOCALLY );
447
448        //---* Add the code block *--------------------------------------------
449        addConstructorCode( builder.build() );
450    }   //  composeInitializationCodeFromResource()
451
452    /**
453     *  <p>{@summary Creates the implementation of the method
454     *  {@link Object#toString()}
455     *  for the configuration bean.} The output of that method will be like
456     *  this:</p>
457     *  <pre><code>&lt;<i>ClassName</i>&gt; <b>[</b>&lt;<i>PropertyName</i>&gt; <b>= &quot;</b>&lt;<i>PropertyValue</i>&gt;<b>&quot;</b>[<b>,</b> â¦]<b>]</b></code></pre>
458     */
459    private final void createToString()
460    {
461        //---* Create the 'toString()' method *--------------------------------
462        final var builder = getComposer().createToStringBuilder()
463            .addStatement( "final var prefix = format ( $1S, getClass().getName() )", "%s [" )
464            .addStaticImport( StringUtils.class, "format" )
465            .addStatement( "final var joiner = new $1T( $2S, prefix, $3S )", StringJoiner.class, ", ", "]" );
466
467        //---* Add the locking *-----------------------------------------------
468        final var lock = getConfiguration().getSynchronizationRequired()
469             ? getField( STD_FIELD_ReadLock )
470             : null;
471        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.beginControlFlow(
472            """
473            try( final var ignored = $N.lock() )
474            """, lock );
475
476        //---* Add the code *--------------------------------------------------
477        var addEmptyLine = false;
478        PropertyLoop:
479        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
480        for( final var i = getProperties(); i.hasNext(); )
481        {
482            final var propertySpec = i.next().merge();
483            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( EXEMPT_FROM_TOSTRING ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
484
485            if( addEmptyLine ) builder.addCode( "\n" );
486            addEmptyLine = true;
487            final var propertyName = propertySpec.getPropertyName();
488            builder.addComment( "Property $1S", propertyName )
489                .beginControlFlow( EMPTY_STRING );
490
491            if( !propertySpec.hasFlag( GETTER_IS_DEFAULT ) )
492            {
493                //---* We have a field â¦ *-------------------------------------
494                final var field = propertySpec.getFieldName();
495
496                if( propertySpec.getStringConverterClass().isPresent() )
497                {
498                    final var stringConverter = propertySpec.getStringConverterClass().get();
499                    if( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverter ) )
500                    {
501                        builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = $1T.INSTANCE", stringConverter );
502                    }
503                    else
504                    {
505                        builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = new $1T()", stringConverter );
506                    }
507                    builder.addStatement( "final var value = stringConverter.toString( $1L )", field )
508                        .beginControlFlow(
509                        """
510                            if( nonNull( value ) )
511                            """ )
512                        .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "nonNull" )
513                        .addStatement(
514                            """
515                            joiner.add( format( "$1N = \\\"%1S\\\"", value ) )""", propertyName )
516                        .addStaticImport( StringUtils.class, "format" )
517                        .nextControlFlow(
518                        """
519                            
520                            else
521                            """ )
522                        .addStatement(
523                            """
524                            joiner.add( format( "$1N = \\\"%1S\\\"", NULL_STRING ) )""", propertyName )
525                        .addStaticImport( CommonConstants.class, "NULL_STRING" )
526                        .addStaticImport( StringUtils.class, "format" )
527                        .endControlFlow();
528                }
529                else
530                {
531                    builder.addStatement(
532                        """
533                        joiner.add( format( "$1N = \\\"%1S\\\"", $2T.toString( $3L ) ) )""", propertyName, Objects.class, field )
534                        .addStaticImport( StringUtils.class, "format" );
535                }
536            }
537            else if( propertySpec.getGetterMethodName().isPresent())
538            {
539                //---* We just have a getter â¦ *-------------------------------
540                final var getterMethod = propertySpec.getGetterMethodName().get();
541                if( propertySpec.getStringConverterClass().isPresent() )
542                {
543                    final var stringConverter = propertySpec.getStringConverterClass().get();
544                    if( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverter ) )
545                    {
546                        builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = $1T.INSTANCE", stringConverter );
547                    }
548                    else
549                    {
550                        builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = new $1T()", stringConverter );
551                    }
552                    builder.addStatement( "final var value = stringConverter.toString( $1L() )", getterMethod )
553                        .beginControlFlow(
554                            """
555                                if( nonNull( value ) )
556                                """ )
557                        .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "nonNull" )
558                        .addStatement(
559                            """
560                            joiner.add( format( "$1N = \\\"%1S\\\"", value ) )""", propertyName )
561                        .addStaticImport( StringUtils.class, "format" )
562                        .nextControlFlow(
563                            """
564                                
565                                else
566                                """ )
567                        .addStatement(
568                            """
569                            joiner.add( format( "$1N = \\\"%1S\\\"", NULL_STRING ) )""", propertyName )
570                        .addStaticImport( CommonConstants.class, "NULL_STRING" )
571                        .addStaticImport( StringUtils.class, "format" )
572                        .endControlFlow();
573                }
574                else
575                {
576                    builder.addStatement(
577                        """
578                        joiner.add( format( "$1N = \\\"%1S\\\"", $2T.toString( $3L() ) ) )""", propertyName, Objects.class, getterMethod )
579                        .addStaticImport( StringUtils.class, "format" );
580                }
581            }
582            builder.endControlFlow();
583        }   //  PropertiesLoop:
584
585        //---* Cleanup *-------------------------------------------------------
586        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.endControlFlow();
587
588        builder.addCode(
589            """
590            
591            //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
592            """
593            )
594            .addStatement( "final var retValue = joiner.toString()" )
595            .addCode( getComposer().createReturnStatement() );
596
597        addMethod( STD_METHOD_ToString, builder.build() );
598    }   //  createToString()
599
600    /**
601     *  Generates the methods, fields and other code for the given property.
602     *
603     *  @param  rawProperty    The property specification.
604     */
605    private final void generateProperty( final PropertySpec rawProperty )
606    {
607        final var property = rawProperty.merge();
608
609        //---* Create the field *----------------------------------------------
610        property.createField( this ).ifPresent( this::addField );
611
612        /*
613         * Create the constructor code for the initialisation of the property.
614         */
615        property.createConstructorFragment( this ).ifPresent( this::addConstructorCode );
616
617        //---* Create the getter *---------------------------------------------
618        if( property.getPropertyName().equals( CONFIG_PROPERTY_RESOURCEBUNDLE.getPropertyName() ) )
619        {
620            property.createGetter( this ).ifPresent( p -> addMethod( STD_METHOD_GetRessourceBundle, p ) );
621        }
622        else
623        {
624            property.createGetter( this ).ifPresent( this::addMethod );
625        }
626
627        //---* Create the getter *---------------------------------------------
628        property.createSetter( this ).ifPresent( this::addMethod );
629
630        //---* Create the 'add' method *---------------------------------------
631        property.createAddMethod( this ).ifPresent( this::addMethod );
632    }   //  generateProperty()
633}
634//  class ConfigBeanBuilder
635
636/*
637 *  End of File
638 */
